rules: Unlimited free changes and refunds, no penalty.
Changes allowed with a high fee ($500). Refunds not permitted.
Unlimited free changes and refunds, $50 service fee for refunds.
Changes allowed with a medium fee ($250). Refunds not permitted after 48 hours.
Changes allowed with a small fee ($100). Refunds allowed with a penalty ($150).
Changes allowed with a medium fee ($150). No refunds permitted.
Changes allowed with a small fee ($75). Refunds allowed with a penalty ($100).
One free change before 7 days. Changes after 7 days incur a $120 fee. No refunds.
Changes not allowed. No refunds. Seat selection fee applies.
One free change for travel date. Must present student ID upon check-in. No refunds.
Minimum 3 passengers required. Changes/Refunds must apply to all tickets. Penalty applies.
Free change up to 24 hours before departure. Refund penalty $50.
Applies only to weekend travel. Free change. Refund penalty $75.
Strictly no changes or refunds under any circumstances.
Government ID required. Flexible change policy. Refund allowed with no penalty.
Free changes and refunds up to departure. Full lounge access included.
Changes allowed with very high fee ($400). No refunds. Upgrade not permitted.
Must be booked 90 days in advance. Free changes. Refund penalty $100.
Must be booked 60 days in advance. Changes and refunds not permitted.
Government ID required. Flexible change policy. Refund allowed with no penalty.
Changes allowed with a high fee ($150). Refund not permitted.
Minimum 10 passengers required. Changes must be done as a group. Refund penalty $20/person.
Changes allowed with a small fee ($50). One-way travel only.
Applies only to peak season travel. Free change up to 7 days before departure. Refund penalty $100.
Changes allowed with a fee ($150). Short-haul flights only. No refunds.
Changes allowed with a fee ($120). Refund allowed with a penalty ($180).
Zero flexibility. No changes, no refunds, no standby.
Requires diplomatic passport. Fully flexible and cancellable without penalty.
Must be booked within 48 hours. No changes or refunds allowed.
Changes allowed with fee ($50). Refund penalty $80.
